attributes.action: Call on Jacqui Smith to stand down as MP and not put her name forward for House of Lords appointment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Call on Jacqui Smith to stand down as MP and not put her name forward for House of Lords appointment.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament, the relevant political party, or the MP concerned.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
